name: Liz
quotes: I’ve had the pleasure of working with Ben as he transitioned from Business Analyst into Product Manager on our content management platform, and he’s made that move seamlessly.
He combines the analytical rigour and problem clarity of an excellent BA with growing product ownership and strong partnership with engineering.
Detail-oriented, positive, and collaborative, he’s been instrumental in improving complex CMS workflows and aligning teams around the right problems to solve.
Ben is a trusted team member and a thoughtful PM.
It is a pleasure to have him on our team, and I’d recommend him highly to any product or platform team.

name: Ben
quotes: I very much value Ben as a colleague and a product ally.
In particular I appreciate that he has put me in front of customers and champions pragmatic solutions.
As an engineer, I'm never left on doubt about what I have to build and why.
His initiatives are always value-driven.
He has also contributed to a healthy team culture, promoting appreciations and team successes.
I would happily recommend Ben to anyone.

name: Katie
quotes: I’ve collaborated with Ben on a number of projects and have always been impressed by his approach as a Product Manager.
He is thorough, deeply knowledgeable about his product and a great team player.
He has also led a number of high value initiatives with confidence.
Ben has exceptional attention to detail and is equally comfortable diving into technical complexities as he is explaining them clearly.
He manages stakeholders effectively, builds strong relationships and is very well liked by his team and peers.

name: Guy
quotes: Ben is great at driving key work
He creates enough space for the team to deliver incrementally.
He understands the challenges of supporting software and balances priorities between building new features and tackling technical challenges.
Any team is going to feel the benefits of having Ben as a leader.

name: Dave
quotes: He never failed to impress me with his initiative, outside the box thinking and willing to learn.
Ben applies a very methodical, patient and enthusiastic approach to his work
A pleasure to work with.
